name: Internet City 2 The Commentary Crime War
name_original: Internet City 2 The Commentary Crime War
description:
After a large group of criminals pulled off the biggest heist in world history. One of the head heist members named Daniel "Killer" Keemstar reinstated "The Five Families"  Now Keem along with Four other Families run all organized crime in the world. But now one of Keem's phones have been stolen and so he calls upon three old friends named AugieRFC, Nicholas Deorio and Bowblax for help. However these three didn't know what they were getting into

Play as YouTubers and Commentators AugieRFC, Nick DeOrio and Bowblax in the sequel to Internet City.

How to save and keep the save file on Mobile:

To save on Mobile devices download a 3rd party browser Chrome, Opera, Brave etc on your phone and play the game that way for some reason the default browser provided on your phone Safari/Google only save the game for a limited time but through Chrome the save is there in definite Note this has been tested on Private browsers Brave/Opera and works the same way More information about the game

Controls:

PC:

Movement: Arrow keys, Num pad

Action: Z, Enter, Space or walk up to it

Cancel: X, Esc, Num pad 0

Menu: X, Esc, Num pad 0

Dash: Shift

Previous Page: Q, Page Up

Next Page: W, Page Down

Scroll Pages: Arrow Keys, Num pad

Xbox Controller:

Movement: D-Pad

Action: A

Cancel: B

Menu: Y

Dash: X

Previous Page: LB

Next Page: RB

Scroll Pages: D-Pad

Playstation Controller:

Movement: D-Pad

Action: X button

Cancel: Circle

Menu: Triangle

Dash: Square

Previous Page: L1

Next Page: R1

Scroll Pages: D-Pad

Mobile Controls:

Movement: Tap destination *2

Action: Tap target

Cancel: Tap with two fingers

Menu: Tap with two fingers

Dash: None

Previous Page: None

Next Page: None

Scroll Pages: Tap and hold as you swipe from inside of page to outside of page.

Mouse:

Movement: Click destination *2

Action: Click Target

Cancel: Right Click

Menu: Right Click

Dash: None

Previous Page: None

Next Page: None

Scroll Pages: Drag from inside of page to outside of page/mouse scroll wheel

Known Bugs and Fixes

Text load Bug: If the text in the game does not load then refresh the page and load from a auto save file.

Can't Load Error: Turn your ringer on so the audio can play
